vans.description: The AR8 was based on the first generation Iveco Daily, and the AR6 was a rebadged first generation Fiat Ducato.
Sold alongside the GMC Safari, the Astro was marketed in multiple configurations, including passenger minivan and cargo van.
The Fiat 242 was a van which was produced by Fiat from 1974. Fiat 242. Fiat 242. Overview. Manufacturer, Fiat. Also called, Citroën C35.
The Ford Galaxy is a seven-seater car produced by Ford of Europe from June 1995 to April 2023.
Ford Pronto - one of the models of cars manufactured by Ford. Ford Pronto received many good reviews of car owners for their consumer qualities.
The Ford Transit is a family of light commercial vehicles manufactured by the Ford Motor Company since 1965, primarily as a cargo van.
Since 2011, the Voyager is sold under the Lancia badge in Europe to strengthen the Chrysler-Lancia integration.
The Dacia Dokker is a panel van and leisure activity vehicle (LAV) built at the Renault factory in Tangier, Morocco.
The SsangYong Istana is a 2, 9, 12 and 15 seater minivan and minibus based on the Mercedes-Benz MB100 'Bus' variant.
